kpi.name: M1014C0

kpi_info.title: NUMBER OF INTER FREQUENCY HHO ATTEMPTS
kpi_info.use: The number of inter frequency hard handover attempts. This counter is updated for a measurement object in which source and target cells are defined. Also Inter-RNC handovers are counted. If cells A and B are in the active set and inter-frequency hard handover to cell C is attempted, this counter is updated by 1 for objects (A,C) and (B,C). UPDATED:When the SRNC starts resource allocation for an inter-frequency HHO. This counter is not updated if the hard handover is prevented by an ongoing layer-3 procedure.

kpi.kpi_alias: NUMBER OF INTER FREQUENCY HHO ATTEMPTS
